name: Window.fetch
description: The fetch() method of the WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope mixin starts the process of fetching a resource from the network, returning a promise which is fulfilled once the response is available.

refs.description: The definition of 'fetch()' in the 'Fetch' specification.
